Description: Quite poorly finished/damaged pendant of light grey schist. Almost trapezoidal in shape, it contains a flat base and rounded, horizontal top. The section is triangular. In the upper part a hole dissects it through the middle.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.8, between levels 1-2
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 137)
